IONIAN SEA.
TURKEY TO ITALY.
DNC 09, DNC 10.
VESSEL, 150 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE
VICINITY 38-00N 019-00E. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
